thread.title: ‘Walking Dead’ T-shirt pulled from shelves for being racist
thread.title_full: ‘Walking Dead’ T-shirt pulled from shelves for being racist

author: NICOLE BITETTE
title: ‘Walking Dead’ T-shirt pulled from shelves for being racist
text:
Updated:   2:19 PM 
A "Walking Dead" T-shirt was pulled from stores after some shoppers found it racist. 
The tee, which read "Eeny meeny miny moe..." and showed the barbed wire-wrapped baseball bat used by the character, was pulled because the rhyme has racist origin, BBC reports . 
Many found it racially insensitive because other versions of the rhyme use the N-word instead of tiger in one of the lines. However, the rhyme is within the context of the series before the character Negan kills his victims. 
A customer told the Sheffield Star that the line "relates directly to the practice of assaulting black people in America."
